nodes.text: The Hand of Skrye was an artifact uncovered by Jedi Master Lene Kostana and her Padawan Sifo-Dyas on Rishi.

The Hand of Skrye was first mentioned in the audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019. The script for the audiobook, which gave the spelling of its name, also identified a voice heard by Dooku in a Force vision as "Darth Skrye."
